titles.title: Accredited Investor Definition Review Act
Accredited Investor Definition Review Act
To amend the Securities Act of 1933 and the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act with respect to the definition of accredited investor, and for other purposes.
Accredited Investor Definition Review Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 34 - 16.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Financial Services. H. Rept. 119-134.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 103.

committee.name: House Financial Services
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
